name: part_000
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ4周年記念LIVE】Special Thank U!! J Medley 【3DLIVE】 [APbMhuPbwkE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Intro medley sequence showcasing Tokoyami Towa's history and previous anniversary lives.
Tokoyami Towa performs the song "bullet" on a high-tech stage.

subtitles.original:
常闇トワ 4周年記念 LIVE
SPECIAL Thank U!! J Medley
subtitles.english:
Tokoyami Towa 4th Anniversary LIVE
SPECIAL Thank U!! J Medley

subtitles.original:
bullet
作詞・作曲：中村未来
subtitles.english:
bullet
Lyrics & Composition: Miku Nakamura

subtitles.original: くだらねぇ完璧なロジック
subtitles.english: Meaningless, perfect logic

subtitles.original: 重すぎて首が落ちちゃう
subtitles.english: It's so heavy my head might fall off

subtitles.original: ねぇ見た目目の前のあの鍵は握ってるんでしょう
subtitles.english: Hey, you're holding that key right in front of your eyes, aren't you?

subtitles.original: 飲み込まれないで　Hello
subtitles.english: Don't get swallowed up, Hello

subtitles.original: お前の欲しいものはなんなんだ
subtitles.english: What is it that you want?

subtitles.original: 連れ出してよ　信じた道だけ
subtitles.english: Take me away, only on the path I believed in

subtitles.original: ゲームはいつでも勝者の手
subtitles.english: The game is always in the winner's hands

subtitles.original: 無理矢理でも
subtitles.english: Even if by force

subtitles.original: 貫いていくの
subtitles.english: I'll keep pushing through

subtitles.original: 甘い囁きは幻覚論
subtitles.english: Sweet whispers are just hallucinations

subtitles.original: 独り這い上がってた方がいい
subtitles.english: It's better to crawl back up alone

subtitles.original: 傲慢な自由とやらは要らない
subtitles.english: I don't need that so-called "arrogant freedom"

subtitles.original: 冗談でコントロールも効かない
subtitles.english: Even as a joke, it can't be controlled

subtitles.original: 狭く狭い今を選択迫られ　嫌になるでしょう
subtitles.english: Being forced to choose in this narrow, narrow present, you'll get sick of it, right?

subtitles.original: たった一つだけ決めろ
subtitles.english: Just decide on one thing

subtitles.original: お前の譲れないものはなんなんだ
subtitles.english: What is it that you won't give up?

subtitles.original: 認めてよ　歪な心
subtitles.english: Acknowledge it, this warped heart

subtitles.original: 今だけは一歩も引けないんだ
subtitles.english: Just for now, I can't take a single step back

subtitles.original: 目を覚まして
subtitles.english: Open your eyes
